result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Manuel L Franklin III

records.addlTxt: /signed and filed.

Defendant Manuel L Franklin III in court.  Attorney Ashley Fard in court for Manuel L Franklin III.  Attorney Jon R Josephsen Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Scheduling conference.  Defense has filed a motion to withdraw as counsel given conflict of interest with SPD's office.  Court GRANTS the motion over objection of the Defendant.  Court will appoint private counsel at county rate pay for the Defendant.  Case adjourned for Status of counsel hearing in Br. 9.
Status conference scheduled for November 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 10-11-2022, filed.
Notice of Motion and Motion to Withdraw as Counsel for Defendant, filed.
Pretrial Services Violation Report 09-12-2022, filed.
Pretrial Services Violation Report 9-7-2022, filed.

Court ORDERS defendant turned over to Justice Point with Level 5 Supervision. The Court ordered defendant to maintain absolute sobriety.  The Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription. The Court ordered defendant to undergo random urine screens, drug tests and breathalyzer test. No possession of firearms or dangerous weapons.

Defendant Manuel L Franklin III in court.  Attorney Ashley Fard appeared by video for Manuel L Franklin III.  Attorney Jon R Josephsen Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court to address Justice Point violation. State's Motion on Bail heard and argued.  The Court ORDERS modification of bail to $5,000.00 Cash Bail and ORDERS defendant turned over to Justice Point with Level 5 Supervision. The Court ordered defendant to maintain absolute sobriety.  The Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription. The Court ordered defendant to undergo random urine screens, drug tests and breathalyzer test. No possession of firearms or dangerous weapons.

Defendant remanded into custody. Case adjourned to Br. 9.
Pretrial Services Violation Report 9-6-2022, filed.

Defendant Manuel L Franklin III appeared by video.  Attorney Ashley Fard appeared by video for Manuel L Franklin III.  Prosecuting attorney Abby Rockendorf in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: Wauwatosa PD Officer B. Wade. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 09.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 8-24-2022, filed.
Pretrial Services Status Report 7/28/22, filed.

Defendant Manuel L Franklin in court with Student Intern Ryan Birschbach under the supervision of Attorney Ashley Fard.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. Due to the lateness of the hour, Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Supervision Report received and filed.  nk
Schedule court date of 07/12/22 @08:30 do not work with Attoreny Fard . Per Fard email 07/13/22 @08:30pm. Updated court date set to 07/13/22 @08:30pm. ALL PARTIES NOTIFIED.

Defendant Manuel L Franklin in court, appear by video with attorney Ashley Fard, appear by video.  Karine O'Byrne appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. State witness was not present. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision Report 6.8.22

Defendant Manuel L Franklin in court with Attorney Ashley Fard; both appear by video.  Erika Strebel appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. Attorney Fard needs time to meet with her client. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision Report 4.27.22
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

Defendant Manuel L Franklin in court with attorney Paige Aleece Styler.  Defendant Manuel L Franklin in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Manuel L Franklin appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Stark, Branch 17.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings. DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Manuel L Franklin III
Current: 4719 N 36th St, Milwaukee, WI 53209   (Effective: 04-20-2022)
Prior: 6108 West Stevenson Street, #1, Milwaukee, WI 53213
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Manuel L Franklin not in court.  Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued. Upon arrest, defendant is ordered remanded to a commissioner. Court ordered any bail on deposit to be forfeited. The forfeiture order is stayed for 30 days pending notice to the defendant. Court makes a finding that there is no possible victim identified, therefore, restitution is not an issue.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 1/28/22 @ 2p
